resources.string:
""As per Instagram's new privacy policy,"" users in some countries need to log in ""for verification purposes ""and"" to access contents."" You will find all downloader apps need login to perform well. 
The login process is ""not controlled"" by the ""INSTANT SAVER"" app as the ""link is generated by Instagram"" itself. This also means that ""neither"" your ""USERNAME" nor"" even your ""PASSWORD"" will be stored inside our INSTANT SAVER app. The website you will login is the ""Instagram official website."" We won't get your information in any way. 
After login in, Instagram will probably send you an email regarding a new login attempt. We will ""only save cookies locally inside our app"" in order to download your ""Stories, Posts and Private account media files"" that ""You"" want to download. 
As this app is ""100% AD Free, we don't need access"" to any form of ""personal data"" from your logged in account in order to show you any personalised Ads and ""we don't share your data with any third party apps"". So,feel free to login without any hesitation and use this app.
